content:
INPUT PROMPT:
Kendrik, this is TPO Lim message, over.
-------
CONTEXT:
{TPO_NAME} calls {CONTROL_CENTER} to surrender his TOA after completion of work. (Non Traffic Hours Track Access and {TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {CONTROL_CENTER}…....)
Depot TC calls {TPO_NAME} to inform SPKS has been removed. ( {DEPOT_CONTROL} activates the TETRA radio number of {TPO_NAME}....)
{TPO_NAME} calls {DEPOT_CONTROL} to request for Track Access  ( {TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {DEPOT_CONTROL}....)
{TPO_NAME} conducts Radio Check with Traffic Controller using Individual Call. ({TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {CONTROL_CENTER}…....)
P-Way Technician, {TPO_NAME}, calls {CONTROL_CENTER} for authorisation to operate SPKS before accessing onto the tracks.( {TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {CONTROL_CENTER}....)

INPUT PROMPT:
TPO Lim, Radio Check, over.
-------
CONTEXT:
{TPO_NAME} conducts Radio Check with Traffic Controller using Individual Call. ({TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {CONTROL_CENTER}…....)
{TPO_NAME} calls {CONTROL_CENTER} to surrender his TOA after completion of work. (Non Traffic Hours Track Access and {TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {CONTROL_CENTER}…....)
{TPO_NAME} calls {DEPOT_CONTROL} to request for Track Access  ( {TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {DEPOT_CONTROL}....)
{TPO_NAME} conducts Radio Check with his Partner, {PARTNER_NAME} using Group Call. ({TPO_NAME} selects the appropriate Group Channel, press the PTT button …..)
Depot TC calls {TPO_NAME} to inform SPKS has been removed. ( {DEPOT_CONTROL} activates the TETRA radio number of {TPO_NAME}....)

INPUT PROMPT:
TPO Lim, Radio Check OK. out.
-------
CONTEXT:
{TPO_NAME} conducts Radio Check with Traffic Controller using Individual Call. ({TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {CONTROL_CENTER}…....)
{TPO_NAME} calls {DEPOT_CONTROL} to request for Track Access  ( {TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {DEPOT_CONTROL}....)
{TPO_NAME} calls {CONTROL_CENTER} to surrender his TOA after completion of work. (Non Traffic Hours Track Access and {TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {CONTROL_CENTER}…....)
{TPO_NAME} conducts Radio Check with his Partner, {PARTNER_NAME} using Group Call. ({TPO_NAME} selects the appropriate Group Channel, press the PTT button …..)
Depot TC calls {TPO_NAME} to inform SPKS has been removed. ( {DEPOT_CONTROL} activates the TETRA radio number of {TPO_NAME}....)
